Text:
function ERU_EP04_10()
    -- .承-4【11月第3週】「国民的アイドルさまご訪問」
    SaveData.Title = "国民的アイドルさまご訪問"

    -- //BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")

PLAY_BGM("BGM03.wav")

    -- //BU：アキラ・部屋着（驚き）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)

    -- //BU：アルメリア・私服（悲しみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ARU02da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1332.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Akira, this is Hermes Himegami. But she has two personalities, and right now she wants to be called Arumeria." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0150.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "P-pleased to meet you." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1099.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "P-pleased to meet you..." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1100.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Hey! Don’t just invite a national idol to your house like she’s a normal friend!!! There’s such a thing as mental preparation!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1333")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Huh? B-but she’s a friend..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Akira punches my flustered stomach lightly. ]])

    MSG([[ Did I screw up bad? While I'm confused by Akira’s unusually bad mood, Arumeria steps in between us and mediates. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ARU02fc")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0151.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Ah, these are some sweets I bought during a date. They’re delicious, so please have some." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1101.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Ah, thank you very much. That’s very kind of you." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1102.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Wait, is this some kind of moving-in greeting!?" ]])

    MSG([[ Akira almost throws the 'Golden Nobunaga Snack,' a specialty of G Prefecture, onto the floor but holds back just in time and puts the snack on the candy shelf. Good girl. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1334.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "If it’s alright, I’d like you to live here as you are, so maybe it’s not wrong." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1103.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "No, that’s wrong. The fundamental mistake is not consulting me, your roommate." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ARU02da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0152.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "I’m sorry... It’s because I brought weird circumstances with me." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_plus0001.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Ugh... N-no, it’s not that I dislike you or anything, it’s just that I got irritated by Minato’s usual reckless actions..." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_plus0002.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Enough already, please explain the situation properlyーーー!!!" ]])

    -- //BU：なし
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ Then I took time to explain the current situation. ]])

    MSG([[ Arumeria is the original personality of Hermes. The date was a trap set by the Himegami family. ]])

    -- //BU：アキラ・部屋着（驚き）、アルメリア・私服（悲しみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG023aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ARU02da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1104.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "I see. So you betrayed the Himegami family and are now officially on the run." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_1105.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Why does Minato always seem to pick up trouble? Is he not a troublemaker but a trouble catcher?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1335.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I-I'm sorry... I really am reflecting on it." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_plus0003.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Here we go again. "Reflecting." Even if you say that, Minato will surely pick up more trouble again. I know that well." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0153.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Akira-chan, I’m truly sorry for dragging you into this." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ha")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_plus0004.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Ugh." ]])

    MSG([[ Because of Arumeria’s words, Akira switched from scolding mode back into her withdrawn mode. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s rare for her to react like that, considering how sharp she usually is with strangers. ]])

    MSG([[ Akira looks at the sad Arumeria and speaks apologetically. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1106.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Ugh... P-please don’t make such a sad face. Well, I do love idols and I’m not reluctant to help." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03eb")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1107.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "In return, please tell me a lot about the idol world." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ARU02ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0154.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Of course. Thank you, Akira-chan." ]])

    -- //CI：158
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"CI158a")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,0,-200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ Arumeria and Akira laugh together. ]])

    MSG([[ Ah, thank goodness. I was worried about how this would go, but it looks like Akira will warm up too. ]])

    MSG([[ While they’re in such a good mood, I’ll apologize and try to be forgiven. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1336.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Thank you, Akira. I’m always grateful to you." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,-200,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1108.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Minato, you must reflect. If next time you catch trouble without consulting me first, I’ll change all your underwear to thongs, so be prepared." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1337.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I-I'm so sorryー!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //BU：なし
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Life wasn’t that easy. In the end, I managed to get forgiven by cooking Akira’s favorite full-course dinner. ]])

    -- //BU
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0155.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Hehe... This feeling is somehow nostalgic." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask017",1000,false)

    MSG([[ And after dinner―― ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG023aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask017",1000,false)

    -- //BU：アルメリア・固有（赤面）、アキラ・部屋着（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ARU04ha")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_plus0006.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Ah. Arumeria-san changed clothes too, huh? Is that Akira’s outfit? It suits you well." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    -- //ミナト追加ボイス

PLAY_VOICE("almeria_plus0005.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Ah, thank you..." ]])
    -- //アルメリア追加ボイス

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_plus0005.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "C-correction! When you compliment, say ‘cute’ not just ‘it suits you,’ okay? You’ve become this cute, so make me bleed a liter or two of nosebleeds." ]])
    -- //アキラ追加ボイス

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_plus0007_1.0.2.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "S-sorry. But if I reacted like that, they’d bleed out a total of 2000cc and die." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    -- //ミナト追加ボイス

    MSG([[ Hiyu-san? She’s an exception. ]])

    MSG([[ Akira hugs the shy Arumeria and happily strokes her white skin. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_plus0006.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Mmm, as expected of an idol’s skin. It’s totally different from Minato’s makeup base." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("almeria_plus0006.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "R-really...? If it really is, I’m glad." ]])

    MSG([[ Arumeria shyly averts her eyes but suddenly widens them as if she discovers something. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ARU04ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0156.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Ah! Hey Akira-chan, is this lotion the one you use on Minato-chan?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_1109.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "O-oh, sharp eyes as always. After all, his parent is the CEO of the cosmetics company ‘Himegami.’" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ARU04ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0157.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Just as I thought, this is the best skincare for boys. You really get it~" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1110.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "It’s the first time someone said that to me. Minato remembers makeup techniques but never remembers which cosmetics are good or bad." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ARU04fa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0158.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "That’s how boys are. Please forgive him." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ARU04ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0159.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Ah! This blush is a great choice too! Akira-chan, you really know your makeup!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1111.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Uhehe... I-I’m not happy even if you praise me. Really, I’m not happy." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ha")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_plus0007.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Um... Is it okay if I call you Arurun?" ]])
    -- //アキラ追加ボイス

PLAY_VOICE("almeria_plus0007.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Of course it’s okay. Then I’ll call you Aki-chan." ]])
    -- //アルメリア追加ボイス

PLAY_VOICE("akira_plus0008.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Arurun! Please tell me your recommended cosmetics too! I want to make Minato even cuter!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ARU04na")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("almeria_plus0008.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Hehe! I think we’ll get along well, Aki-chan~ <sprite="Emoji" name="note"> Leave it to big sister Arurun—bring on the cute phenomenon!" ]])
    -- //アルメリア追加ボイス

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1338.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "W-wow, to get along so quickly with Akira... Arumeria-san is just as amazing as Hermes-san." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ It usually takes Akira two months on average (by my count) to start using a nickname, but they became this friendly in just a few hours. ]])

    MSG([[ Compared to Hermes, Arumeria seemed cooler, but maybe she’s basically gentle and caring. ]])

    MSG([[ I quietly watch Arumeria and Akira happily talking from a bit of a distance. ]])

    MSG([[ Praying that this peaceful time continues forever―― ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERU_EP04_11")
end
